snippet: At the murder trial of Oscar Pistorius, the South African double-amputee track star, a witness described “bloodcurdling screams” on the night he is alleged to have killed his girlfriend.
abstract: Trial of South African double-amputee track star Oscar Pistorius on murder charges begins; witness describes hearing screams shortly before Pistorius's girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp was shot and killed; Pistorius maintains his innocence, saying he believed an armed intruder was in his locked bathroom rather than Steenkamp.

byline.contributor: Alan Cowell contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: At the murder trial of Oscar Pistorius, the South African double-amputee track star, a witness described “bloodcurdling screams” on the night he is alleged to have killed his girlfriend.

headline.main: Witness in Pistorius Trial Tells of Screams and Gunshots
headline.print_headline: Witness in Pistorius Trial Tells of Screams and Gunshots
